page.title: 20WEST CALDER NOW
page.content: The population today in West calder is about 3300 and in Polbeth it is about 3500.Although mining is now gone the area boast a small industrial estate comprising of Mulholland plant hire,Maccaferri gabion makers and Daks-Simpson clothing manufacturers. {Something about the people who worked {on the project. Adele Barrowman(girl) Date of Birth 25.10.74 Scott Cooperwhite(boy) D.O.B.25.4.74 Neil Hall(boy) D.O.B 21.1.74 Leigh-Ann Kiltie(girl) D.O.B 13.4.74 Claire Roy(girl) D.O.B 13.8.74 Munaza Saleem(girl)D.O.B 28.7.74 Robert Seaton(boy)D.O.B 30.9.74 Ann Marie Tattersall(girl)D.O.B 24.6.74 Mark Turner(boy)D.O.B 20.4.74 Pamela Watson(girl)D.O.B 17.1.75 Linda Whigham(girl)D.O.B 8.6.74 Lesley Young(girl)D.O.B 13.3.74
